name: Creamy Mushroom Basil Pasta
instruction: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Add the pasta and cook it according to the instructions on the package until it is al dente.
Slice the mushrooms and sprinkle a pinch of salt over them. Then, saut√© the mushrooms in a pan until they turn golden brown and release their moisture. This should take about 5-7 minutes.
Add the garlic butter sauce and fresh basil to the mushrooms and stir until the sauce starts boiling.
add the cooked pasta to the mushroom mixture and stir everything together until the pasta is well coated in the sauce.
